creator: kelley@insidesystems.net
text: Attempting to use the conventional - as stdout for the -d argument just writes "-/<original_file>"

Hi Kelley. What argument are you using with -d to get this response?

Alan
creator: alan.pandit@gmail.com

text:
I'm using -. For example:

java -Xmx512m -jar batik-rasterizer.jar -d - test.svg
About to transcode 1 SVG file(s)

Converting test.svg to -/test.png ... ... success

I was expecting output to stdout, perhaps I'm using it incorrectly?
creator: kelley@insidesystems.net
